arabic_text: ٱلَّذِينَ كَانَتۡ أَعۡيُنُهُمۡ فِي غِطَآءٍ عَن ذِكۡرِي وَكَانُواْ لَا يَسۡتَطِيعُونَ سَمۡعًا
translation: (101) Those whose eyes had been within a cover [removed] from My remembrance,[801] and they were not able to hear.[802]
footnotes:
[801]- i.e., Allāh's signs or the Qur’ān.
[802]- They refused to listen to the Qur’ān or to understand it.
